mapper.select: SELECT e_humanpay_number AS eHumanpayNumber , theme_number AS themeNumber , pp_work_number AS ppWorkNumber , e_humanpay_name AS eHumanpayName , e_humanpay_residentnumber AS eHumanpayResidentnumber , e_humanpay_expectpay AS eHumanpayExpectpay , e_humanpay_expectday AS eHumanpayExpectday , e_humanpay_secret AS eHumanpaySecret FROM sp_e_humanpay
